attributes.action: make illegal any military invasion of a country without the majority consent of the citizens of this democratic country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No Prime Minister of this country will have the authority to go to war with another country without a clear mandate from the people of this country.Should a Prime Minister take this country to war then he will ensure that all casualty numbers both civilian and military are accurately recorded. The estimated cost of any invasion force to the taxpayer and the proposed outcome of any invasion  will also be published. Any failure by military/political leaders to achieve peaceful solutions as a proposed outcome will immediately secure the return of all military personnel from the dispute.
